main.name: Aiden Kopec
main.description: My passion for software is based off of a user friendly interface for all levels of user applications. I started as a self taught developer till I started my education at the Southern Alberta Institute Of Technology
main.bio: I have an entrepreneurial spirit that was born from my passion for eCommerce.  At the age of 15, I started up my own eCommerce company, Blue Rock Jewelry that focused on retail fashion.  I had to create and implement a website that provided products and services that fulfilled customer orders online.  I then became involved in financial stocks markets, crypto and other eCommerce businesses.  This fuelled a passion for software development that led me to pursue my diploma in Software Development at Southern Alberta Institute of Technology (SAIT).

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I have acquired over the years!

education.description: Currently at SAIT perusing my Diploma in Software Development. Expected to graduate In December 2022. I have received an Honors reward from Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society.

work.title: Hockey Referee
work.description1: Officiate Junior A, B, Midget and Bantam Hockey Teams
work.description2: Enforce all rules and regulations of Hockey Canada are followed
work.description3: Communicate professionally with players, coaches, and parents.
work.description5: Calmly interact in high stressed, difficult situations.
work.description6: Effectively make quick and hard decisions.
work.description7: Demonstrate leadership qualities and ability to work as part of a dynamic team

work.title: Sales Consultant
work.description1: Acknowledge and assist customers; locate merchandise effectively using various methods.
work.description2: Support sales floor, fitting room, check out and back of house processes.
work.description3: Promote loyalty by educating customers about products and loyalty programs.
work.description5: Actively seeking out and engaging with customers in the store
work.description6: Handling all returns and customer issues courteously and professionally

work.title: Concierge
work.description1: Detailing the interior and exterior of vehicles that come to the dealership for maintenance
work.description2: Moving cars between the storage facility and display area.
work.description3: Ensure that customers get to and from dealership safely and professionally.
work.description4: Driving off-site to run dealership errands when required.
work.description5: Ensure all telephone calls are answered promptly, courteously and professionally.
work.description6: Receive and document payment tendered by customers on behalf of sales, service and parts department.
work.description7: Makes appointments for customer services over the phone

projects.title: Web Development
projects.category: All My Web Projects with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON
